name: TKSmartCardPINFormat
desc: The formatting properties for a PIN, such as character encoding and length constraints.

items.name: var charset: TKSmartCardPINFormat.Charset
items.desc: The format of PIN characters. TKSmartCardPINCharsetNumeric by default.

items.name: var encoding: TKSmartCardPINFormat.Encoding
items.desc: The encoding of PIN characters. TKSmartCardPINEncodingASCII by default.

items.name: var minPINLength: Int
items.desc: The minimum number of characters to form a valid PIN. 4 by default.

items.name: var maxPINLength: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of characters to form a valid PIN. 8 by default.

items.name: var pinBlockByteLength: Int
items.desc: The total length of the PIN block in bytes. 8 by default.

items.name: var pinJustification: TKSmartCardPINFormat.Justification
items.desc: The justification within the PIN block. TKSmartCardPINJustificationLeft by default.

items.name: var pinBitOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bits, within the PIN block to mark a location for filling in the formatted PIN, which is justified with respect to the pinJustification property value. 0 by default.

items.name: var pinLengthBitOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bits, within the PIN block to mark a location for filling in the PIN length, which is always left justified. 0 by default.

items.name: var pinLengthBitSize: Int
items.desc: The size, in bits, of the PIN length field. If set to 0, PIN length is not written. 0 by default.
